name: Full-Stack Software developer
description:
Aramco Research Center – Moscow is offering great job opportunities for software engineers to ensure continuous development of intelligent solutions for oil and gas industry. The successful candidate will be working in a cross-functional team to further develop our software and support our technology deployment .This position is intended to fill the niche in the development of novel petroleum technologies, which are focused on the intensive application of artificial intelligence and data analytics techniques.

Key functions and responsibilities:

  • Design and architect software solutions, such as back-ends (numerical simulators), front-ends (GUI, dashboards and web interfaces) and scientific visualization tools for large scale data based on cutting-edge R&D development;
  • Maintain and continuously improve the performance of software solutions for various deployment scenarios based on the availability of the data.
  • Ensure smooth and effective transfer integrated models within R&D programs and customer projects.
  • Clearly and regularly communicate with research staff and business owners on research concept implementation, software development and deployment;
  • Test and enhance software products to ensure strong functionality and optimization;
  • Recommend improvements to existing software solutions as necessary.
  • Follow company requirements for processes, documentation and reporting

Key technical skills and competencies:

  • Proven experience for working as a software developer and/or architect in academy or industry
  • Good knowledge of Windows/Linux, MLOps, GitLab, IDE’s, containerization technology
  • Excellent practical skills for software engineering, particularly for Python , C#, .NET and C/C++;
  • Good knowledge and hands-on experience for data analytics and ML solution deployment through TIBCO Spotfire or other data analytics platforms
  • Hands-on experience for implementing machine learning algorithms and data analytics pipelines in deployment-ready software solutions using different frameworks and software technologies
  • Good communication skills in English (writing and speaking) are important. Please use profile in English applying for this role.
